thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com
thread.title: Wendy Robinson

author: Wendy Robinson
title: Wendy Robinson
text:
We booked 6 housesits over a 6 month period. We are a family of 4 (2 Teens along with my hubby and I.
Our sits were:
1 in Seattle, 4 in England and 1 in Thailand over a month period. We only had one very bad experience and that was due to the home owner - not TrustedHousesitters. In fact, we have kept in touch with 3 of our house sit homeowners and are now friends.
We learned a lot, had a lot of great experiences and we managed to accomplish our goal of staying places for Free but even more - to meet locals and live like locals instead of tourists.
I have been referring people to Trustedhousesitters for almost a year now and think it's the most reliable system that I have used thus far to find house sits.
We loves and miss the animals we connected with and are looking at more opportunities over the next 6 months as well.
